statement.summary: Asociația Community powered by DLOT is a non-profit organization focused on environmental protection

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.p1: We aim for a world where people can coexist in harmony; where technology is used for protecting nature and wildlife, so we can all benefit from clean air and water, food and shelter. A world guided by respect and consensus between humans and nature.

values.title: Our Values
list: We advocate for environment friendly actions and products
We support life as a continuous state of exploration and discovery of the self
We promote love and acceptance for everyone and everything around us
We sustain the cultural influence of music
values.p2: We are committed to a balanced lifestyle. We aim for a life in which technology and nature combine and reach the equilibrium between progress and spirituality.

mission.title: Our Mission
list: Cleaning litter from natural environments such as forests, banks of water, natural parks and other outdoor protected areas
Identifying regions where trash is improperly disposed and drawing attention of the concerned authority towards the situation
Educating tourists and rural communities about the importance of properly disposing trash and providing them the means to collect and recycle the waste
Promoting behaviors oriented to minimize the environmental impact of each individual without getting far from their comfort zone
Achieving a healthy and balanced lifestyle by spending time outdoors and protecting nature

tell.title: Spread the word
tell.p1: Share our concept, educate others, raise awareness about the importance of protecting the envronment and keeping nature clean.

joinus.title: join our team
joinus.p1: You're looking for opportunities to test and improve your skills, gain work experience, or you simply like our concept?
p2: Do you have any talents/skills that can help us achieve our mission?
Would you like to develop those skills?

joinus.p3: If the answer is Yes, you're in the right place.

manyhands.title: Many hands make light work
p1: We’re looking for volunteers for remote positions and environment clean-up projects.
As we just started our activity, we can offer many prospects. Check-out the list below and {email-link} if something piques your interest.
manyhands.p2: Maybe you like to write stories, or you’re good at planning and organizing, you have a passion for people, animals and nature, you’re creative, or you like to spend time outdoors and want to join us in our {tripandpick-link} campaigns.
manyhands.p3: It doesn't matter if you don't check all the boxes for a certain position. Tell us what you would like to do and how much time you can commit, and we will find a way to highlight your skills.

whatsinit.title: What's in it for you
list: Flexible schedule
Work from wherever you want
Free access to our events
Engage in brainstorming and your ideas will be taken into account. You can also propose campaigns and strategies, even business directions
Being at the onset of our activity, your contribution can be easily quantified to measure the value added to the organization’s growth
Work related expenditures such as transport, fuel, stationary, prints and others, are reimbursed
Based on the level of involvement and results, there is the possibility of being hired in the future
Opportunity to adhere as a member of the NGO
You’ll lead the change in society, labor market, employers and brands, towards a sustainable development
whatsinit.p1: You have nothing to lose, you can quit at any time you feel it no longer suits you or if we do not meet your expectations.

projects.title: our projects
projects.p1: Hiking, trekking or just relaxing, the benefits of spending time in nature are enormous.
projects.p2: By protecting the planet and wildlife, we are protecting our future, as we cannot survive while the natural ecosystems collapse.
projects.p3: The data is visible, on our beaches, forests, lakes and mountains. From the city park to the Everest, the traces left by humans illustrate the problem. Yet, people are walking off these places empty handed.

tripandpick.title: Trip & Pick

p1.content: {tripandpick-hashtag} is about enjoying time outdoors and taking part in the environmental clean-up.

tripandpick.p2: Even if it’s only a few things (cigarette butts or candy wrappers), or even one item, it counts.
tripandpick.p3: Next time you take a trip outside the urban area, bring some garbage bags with you and pick up the litter found along the route.

p4.content: You can also join us in our trips. Explore the events calendar below and {tripandpick-email-link} for details
